c.e:
<SolaceBreadcrumb
						paths={[
							{ title: en.connectors.connectorFlows, link: CONNECTOR },
							{
								title: connectorDetails?.name ?? "",
								link: "editV2",
								current: true
							}
						]}
					/>

<SolaceBreadcrumb
						paths={[
							{ title: "Micro-Integrations", link: CONNECTOR },
							{
								title: connectorDetails?.name ?? "",
								link: `/${id}`,
								current: true
							}
						]}
					/>

(connectorDetails?.state === IntegrationState.notdeployed ||
						connectorDetails?.state === IntegrationState.error) &&
					hasAdminMiAccess
						? [
								<SolaceButton key="editButton" variant="text" onClick={handleEditButton}>
									{en.connectors.labels.editConnectorFlow}
								</SolaceButton>
							]
						: !hasAdminMiAccess
							? [<RoleIconWrapper key="roleIconWrapper" resourceRole={"viewer"} withLabel />]
							: undefined

<SolaceMenu
						key="actionitems"
						buttonProps={{
							children: <MoreHorizOutlinedIcon />,
							title: "Actions",
							variant: "icon",
							dataQa: "connectors_additional_actions"
						}}
						anchorOrigin={{ horizontal: "right", vertical: "bottom" }}
						transformOrigin={{ horizontal: "right", vertical: "top" }}
						id={"connectors_additional_actions"}
						items={menuItems}
					/>
[{ title: t({ id: "id_cluster_manager", message: "Cluster Manager" }), link: ROUTER_SERVICES, current: true }]

hasWriteAccess
							? [
									<SolaceButton key="create_service" variant="text" dataQa="create-service-action" onClick={handleCreateService}>
										<Trans id="id_create_service">Create Service</Trans>
									</SolaceButton>
							  ]
							: undefined

<SolaceTabs
						activeTabValue={tab}
						tabs={[
							{ label: t({ id: "id_status", message: "Status" }), value: "status" },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_connect", message: "Connect" }), value: "connect", disabled: areTabsDisabled },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_manage", message: "Manage" }), value: "manage", disabled: areTabsDisabled },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_monitoring", message: "Monitoring" }), value: "monitoring", disabled: areTabsDisabled },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_configuration", message: "Configuration" }), value: "configuration", disabled: isInProgress },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_tryme", message: "Try Me!" }), value: "tryme", disabled: areTabsDisabled }
						]}
						onTabClick={(value) => {
							if (value === "manage") {
								if (missionControl?.manageUI) {
									history.push(routeSetParams(ROUTER_SERVICES_DETAILS_MANAGE, { serviceId, category: "security" }));
								} else {
									history.push(routeSetParams(ROUTER_SERVICES_DETAILS_MANAGE_LEGACY, { serviceId }));
								}
							} else {
								history.push(routeSetParams(ROUTER_SERVICES_DETAILS, { serviceId: service?.id as string, tab: value }));
							}
							window.setTimeout(() => {
								scrollToTop();
							}, 100);
						}}
					></SolaceTabs>
[{ title: t({ id: "id_mesh_manager", message: "Mesh Manager" }), link: ROUTER_MESHES, current: true }]

hasWriteAccess
							? [
									<SolaceButton key="create_event_mesh" variant="text" dataQa="create-event-mesh-action" onClick={handleCreateMesh}>
										<Trans id="id_create_event_mesh">Create Event Mesh</Trans>
									</SolaceButton>
							  ]
							: undefined

<SolaceTabs
						activeTabValue={tab}
						tabs={[
							{ label: t({ id: "id_activity_tab_planned", message: "Planned Activities" }), value: PLANNED },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_activity_tab_completed", message: "Completed Activities" }), value: COMPLETED }
						]}
						onTabClick={handleTabClick}
					/>

hasAdminPermissions
						? [
								<SolaceButton dense variant="text" key="create-maintenance-window" isDisabled={false} onClick={() => handleCreateDialog()} dataQa="createMaintenanceWindow">
									<Trans id="id_window_create">Create Window</Trans>
								</SolaceButton>
						  ]
						: []

<SolaceEnvironmentChip
											label={dialogState.name || "Environment Name"}
											fgColor={fgColor}
											bgColor={bgColor}
											icon={Icons16[dialogState.icon as SolaceEnvironmentIcons]}
										/>

[
				<SolaceButton key="create-plan" variant="text" onClick={() => handleModal()}>
					Create Plan
				</SolaceButton>
			]

[
				<SolaceButton
					key="maintenance-activities"
					onClick={() => handleActivitiesRoute()}
					variant="text"
					dataQa="create"
				>
					Maintenance Activities
				</SolaceButton>,
				<SolaceButton key="manage-upgrade-button" onClick={() => handlePlanRoute()} variant="text" dataQa="create">
					Manage Upgrade Plans
				</SolaceButton>,
				<SystemControls key="system-controls" />
			]
